item.title: You can play classic Nintendo games on these custom SNES-inspired Nike sneakers

The AIR SNES are a heavily customized version of the Nike Air Max 90 inspired by other gaming-themed sneakers like Bull Airs’ ShoeBoys, but […]

item.title: La meilleure des manettes pour smartphones et tablettes est à -34 % grâce au Black Friday
item.description: Compatible avec les smartphones et les petites tablettes, confortable, personnalisable... La Razer Kishi Ultra est une manette mobile qui a remporté tous les suffrages chez nous. Son seul défaut ? Son prix de base, un peu élevé. Heureusement, on la trouve à 112,99 euros au lieu de 169,99 euros pendant le Blacl Friday.

item.title: An immigration agent’s use of ChatGPT for reports is raising alarms. Experts explain why
item.description: In a court opinion, U.S. District Judge Sara Ellis said that using ChatGPT to write use-of-force reports ‘may explain the inaccuracy of these reports.’ Tucked in a two-sentence footnote in a voluminous court opinion, a federal judge recently called out immigration agents using artificial intelligence to write use-of-force reports, raising concerns that it could lead to inaccuracies and further erode public confidence in how police have handled the immigration crackdown in the Chicago area and ensuing protests.U.S. District Judge Sara Ellis wrote the footnote in a 223-page opinion issued last ...

item.title: Trump’s plan for extending healthcare subsidies is running into a divided GOP. Here’s why
item.description: The tentative proposal would extend expiring Affordable Care Act subsidies for two years while also adjusting eligibility requirements. A health care proposal circulated by the White House in recent days is running into the reality of Republican divisions on the issue — a familiar struggle for a party that has been trying to scrap or overhaul the Affordable Care Act for the past 15 years.The tentative proposal from President Donald Trump would extend expiring ACA subsidies for two years while adjusting eligibility requirements for recipients. The plan has so far been met with a stony silence o...
